snippet: A three-year investigation into child pornography has led to the rescue of 386 children around the world and the arrest of 348 people, the Toronto police said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: A three-year investigation into child pornography has led to the rescue of 386 children around the world and the arrest of 348 people, the Toronto police said Thursday.

headline.main: Canada: Hundreds Arrested in Child Pornography Investigation
headline.print_headline: Canada: Hundreds Arrested in Child Pornography Investigation
